name: Ubuntu CDE
tagline: An Ubuntu Remix with the Common Desktop Enviroment installed.
body:
Created by [Joey Schaff](https://www.twitter.com/Jaoheah), with huge help from [Kai](https://www.twitter.com/KaiLikesLinux) the lead developer of [Ubuntu Lumina](https://github.com/Ubuntu-Lumina) and [Joshua](https://www.twitter.com/ItzSwirlz) the lead developer of [Ubuntu Cinnamon](https://github.com/Ubuntu-Cinnamon-Remix)

Ubuntu CDE is currently under development. This is my first ever attempt at making a Remix of Ubuntu, so it may take a while for the first ISO to come out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
